definition: (emphatic sentence-final particle, used instead of 啊[a5] after a word ending in "n")
which? (interrogative, followed by classifier or numeral-classifier)
to be afraid/to fear/to dread/to be unable to endure/perhaps

sentences.english: Could you stay for me, even just a moment?
sentences.chinese: 你可愿为我停留，哪怕只是片刻？

sentences.english: It's enough if there are merely other people on the beach.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕沙滩上有其他人，那也就足够了。

sentences.english: Even when deep inside we know it can t be.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕在内心深处我们清楚这不可能。

sentences.english: He is still in his overcoat even when he's in the room.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕是在房间里，他也是穿着大衣不脱。

sentences.english: Even with sorrow, it's still good.
Even if you’re the kindest person, there are still going to be people and things you will need to forgive.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕你是最仁慈的人，仍然有你需要原谅的人和事。

sentences.english: It used to be said that English people take their pleasures sadly.
sentences.chinese: 人们常说英国人哪怕遇上乐事也还是落落寡欢。

sentences.english: Even just passing gossip and hearsay can prime your mind for illness with potent effect.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕只传传流言蜚语和道听途说都能灌输强烈影响。

sentences.english: When French femmes fatales appear on the silver screen, we seem to be almost embraced by a pleasant fragrance.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕法兰西美女仅出现在荧幕上，就带来袭人暗香。

sentences.english: To meet the needs of the poor.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕是为了满足穷人的需要。

sentences.english: Woah, all you singletons, ohh, even the white kids.
sentences.chinese: 喔，所有的单身者，噢，哪怕是小白羊。

sentences.english: Speak your mind… even if your voice shakes.
sentences.chinese: 果敢说出你的想法，哪怕声响会惊怖。

sentences.english: I thank strangers who’ve shown me little acts of kindness.
sentences.chinese: 我感谢陌生人，哪怕他们只对我表示一丁点友好。

sentences.english: The star could rain down from the heavens now and I would not care.
sentences.chinese: 现在哪怕落星如雨，自天堂坠落，我也不在乎。

sentences.english: Only Siming even here, but also from the dead to find, health significance.
sentences.chinese: 哪怕这里只有死命，也要从死亡中寻找，生的意义。

definition: at the minimum/at the very least
whatever the case/in any event/no matter what/by all possible means
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
let alone/to say nothing of/besides/what's more
